title: Xiong Chumo Zhi Xiongxiong Leyuan 3
sinopse:
"Bear-infested Bear Paradise 3" is the 12th season of bear-infested cartoons and also the third season of Bear-infested Bear Paradise. Continuing the plot of the previous episode, it is unfolded in the kindergarten with big trees in the forest. Xiong Da, Xiong Er, Bald Head Qiang, Ji Ji, Mao Mao, Beng Beng, Tu Tu and Carrot Head take place between classes, after class, and in life. Interesting stories of...
On the basis of the original entertaining and sophisticated production, a series of new characters such as "Mao Mao Dad" have been added. The parent-child theme runs through the overall story, which further meets the needs of fans and the whole family to watch together.(translated from baidu baike)
